ovdesc.p: This table holds the dates for monthly maturity contracts when MATURITY.DATE in contract master is set to TABLE.CALC.UPDATE or TABLE.ONLY.
Manual input to the table is allowed only when MATURITY.DATE is set to TABLE.ONLY in contract master.

desc.p: Contract code is an valid contract master whose maturity type is monthly and maturity date is of format YYYYMM.
Gets defaulted with contract code from @ID and is a valid contract master key.
Gets defaulted with maturity date from @ID and is of format YYYYMM.
This field holds the date calculated using the formulae defined in field LAST.TRADE.DATE of contract master.
This field holds the date calculated using the formulae defined in field FIRST.NOTICE of contract master.
This field holds the date calculated using the formulae defined in field LAST.NOTICE of contract master.
This field holds the date calculated using the formulae defined in field LAST.DELIVERY of contract master.
This field holds the date calculated using the formulae defined in field SPOT.DATE of contract master.
This field holds the date calculated using the formulae defined in field DEC.DATE of contract master.
This field holds the date calculated using the formulae defined in field DEC.DATE of contract master.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
